# Utility Actions

Composite GitHub Actions for Utility projects.

| Name | Description |
|------|-------------|
| [KMP Detect Changes](kmp-detect-changes.md) | Detects changes in KMP project to determine which platform-specific workflows should run |
| [Detect Changes & Changelog](detect-changes-changelog.md) | Detects changes since the last built commit and generates a changelog. |
| [JIRA Transition Tickets](jira-transition-tickets.md) | Finds and transitions JIRA tickets based on branch names. |
